column5: Writtle University College is one of the most famous and well-respected centres for horticultural technology and research. Postgraduate students from the Writtle University College are highly regarded throughout this international industry, and often go on to work on major projects affecting the production, storage and supply of food and fuel crops across the globe.Students studying there will have access to the Research glasshouse, farms and the postharvest unit which undertakes research and trials in conjunction with commercial companies.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
